AT.name: Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop
AT.description: In Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop macht es jede Menge Spaß, verschiedene Desserts und Süßigkeiten herzustellen! Spieler kreieren diverse köstlich aussehende Süßigkeiten und Desserts, stellen sie her und servieren sie dann Kunden im Laden, um diese bei Laune zu halten. Erschaffe 60 verschiedene Rezepte in mehr als 160 unterschiedlichen Minispielen. Dabei nutzt du den Nintendo 3DS-Touchpen und sogar das Mikrofon, um deine Kreationen umzurühren, zu backen, zu kühlen und zu dekorieren. Wie immer brauchst du dir keine Sorgen zu machen, wenn etwas schiefgeht – Mama richtet das schon! Süßigkeiten können im Laden präsentiert werden und dann an Kunden verteilt, um sie alle glücklich zu machen. Je mehr Süßigkeiten du kreierst und abschließt, desto mehr Rezepte entdeckst du und desto größer wird dein Laden. Noch besser wird es, wenn du gegen deine Freunde in einem Wettkochen für bis zu vier Spieler antrittst und siehst, wer die köstlichsten Leckereien schafft! • Komm zu Mama in die Küche und hilf ihr, viele verschiedene leckere Süßigkeiten und Desserts herzustellen! • Erschaffe 60 verschiedene Rezepte in mehr als 160 Minispielen mithilfe des Nintendo 3DS-Touchpen und sogar des Mikrofons. • Stelle deine süßen Kreationen in deinem eigenen Laden aus, um deine Kunden zufrieden zu halten. • Erweitere deinen Laden und löse besondere Ereignisse aus, indem du so viele Rezepte wie möglich herstellst!

AU.name: Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop
AU.description: Making puddings and sweets is lots of fun in Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop! Players make and create a wide assortment of delicious looking sweets and puddings, then serve customers in the shop to keep them happy. Create 60 different recipes by taking part in over 160 different mini-games, using the Nintendo 3DS™ stylus and even the microphone to cool, slice, stir, bake and decorate their creations. And just like always, don’t worry if you make a mistake - Mama will fix it for you! Sweets can be arranged and displayed in the sweet shop, then given to your customers to bring happiness to them all. The more sweets you create and complete, the more recipes you discover and the more your shop expands. Better yet, take on your friends in a competitive cook-off for up to four players, seeing who can make the tastiest treats of all! • Join Mama in the kitchen and help her create many different delicious sweets and puddings! • Create 60 different recipes in over 160 mini-games by using the Nintendo 3DS™ stylus and even the microphone. • Arrange and display your sweet creations in your very own sweet shop to keep your customers happy. • Expand your sweet shop and trigger special events by making as many recipes as you can!

BE.name: Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop
BE.description: Réalisez des puddings et des confiseries dans Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop ! Les joueurs créent un large assortiment de confiseries et puddings délicieux puis les servent aux clients de la boutique pour les rendre heureux. Créez 60 recettes différentes en participant à plus de 160 mini-jeux grâce au stylet Nintendo 3DS™ et même au microphone pour refroidir, couper, mélanger, cuire et décorer vos créations. Et comme toujours, ne vous inquiétez pas si vous fates un faux pas : Mama sera là pour y remédier ! Les confiseries peuvent être arrangées et exposées dans le magasin puis données aux clients pour tous les contenter. Plus vous créez et terminez de confiseries, plus vous découvrez de recettes et plus votre boutique s'agrandit. Encore mieux, défiez vos amis dans des concours comprenant jusqu'à quatre joueurs pour voir qui sait faire les meilleures douceurs ! • Rejoignez Mama dans la cuisine et aidez-la à créer de nombreux puddings et confiseries différentes ! • Créez 60 recettes différentes dans plus de 160 mini-jeux grâce au stylet Nintendo 3DS™ et même au microphone. • Arrangez et exposez vos créations dans votre propre confiserie pour satisfaire tous vos clients. • Agrandissez votre confiserie et déclenchez des événements spéciaux en suivant autant de recettes que vous pouvez !

ES.name: Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop
ES.description: ¡Preparar postres y dulces es muy divertido en Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop! Prepara una amplia variedad de deliciosos dulces y postres, y luego sírveselos a los clientes en la pastelería para tenerlos contentos. Elabora 60 recetas diferentes participando en más de 160 minijuegos distintos con el lápiz táctil de Nintendo 3DS™ e incluso el micrófono para enfriar, cortar, revolver, hornear y decorar tus creaciones. Y como viene siendo habitual, no te preocupes si metes la pata: ¡mamá lo arreglará para ti! Puedes exponer los dulces en la pastelería para luego ofrecérselos a tus clientes y hacerlos felices. Cuantos más dulces crees y completes, más recetas descubrirás y más se ampliará tu pastelería. Y lo mejor: ¡disfruta con hasta cuatro amigos de un concurso gastronómico para ver quién prepara las mejores creaciones! • ¡Únete a Mama en la cocina y ayúdale a crear un montón de dulces y postres riquísimos! • Prepara 60 recetas diferentes en más de 160 minijuegos usando el lápiz táctil de Nintendo 3DS™ e incluso el micrófono. • Organiza y expón tus dulces creaciones en tu propia pastelería para tener contentos a tus clientes. • ¡Amplía tu pastelería y activa eventos especiales haciendo tantas recetas como puedas!

IT.name: Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop
IT.description: Preparare budini e dolci è divertente in Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop! I giocatori preparano e creano un grande assortimento di dolci e budini dall’aspetto delizioso, poi li servono ai clienti del negozio per mantenerli contenti. Crea 60 diverse ricette e partecipa a 160 diversi minigiochi, usando lo stilo Nintendo 3DS™ e anche il microfono per raffreddare, affettare, mescolare, cuocere e decorare le tue creazioni. E come sempre, non preoccuparti se fai un errore: Mama lo correggerà per te! I dolci possono venire sistemati ed esposti nel negozio, poi serviti ai clienti per renderli felici. Più dolci prepari e completi, più ricette scoprirai, allargando il tuo negozio. Ancora meglio, sfida i tuoi amici in una gara di cucina fino a 4 partecipanti per scoprire chi sa cucinare i dolci più buoni! • Entra nella cucina di Mama e aiutala a creare tanti dolci e budini deliziosi! • Crea 60 diverse ricette in più di 160 minigiochi usando lo stilo Nintendo 3DS™ e perfino il microfono. • Sistema ed esponi le tue dolci creazioni nel tuo negozio per rendere felici i clienti. • Espandi il tuo dolce negozio ed attiva gli eventi speciali creando quante più ricette possibile!

And just like always, don’t worry if you make a mistake - Mama will fix it for you! Sweets can be arranged and displayed in the sweet shop, then given to your customers to bring happiness to them all. The more sweets you create and complete, the more recipes you discover and the more your shop expands. Better yet, take on your friends in a competitive cook-off for up to four players, seeing who can make the tastiest treats of all! • Join Mama in the kitchen and help her create many different delicious sweets and puddings! • Create 60 different recipes in over 160 mini-games by using the Nintendo 3DS™ stylus and even the microphone. • Arrange and display your sweet creations in your very own sweet shop to keep your customers happy. • Expand your sweet shop and trigger special events by making as many recipes as you can!

NL.name: Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop
NL.description: Toetjes en snoep maken is superleuk in Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop! Spelers maken en bakken allerlei heerlijke lekkernijen en toetjes en bedienen daarna klanten in de winkel om hen tevreden te houden. Maak 60 verschillende recepten in 160 verschillende mini-spellen met behulp van de Nintendo 3DS™-stylus en de microfoon en snij, roer, bak en decoreer al die wonderlijke creaties. En zoals altijd hoef je je niet druk te maken als je iets verkeerd doet: Mama lost het wel voor je op! Snoep kun je in de snoepwinkel uitstallen en aan je klanten geven om ze gelukkig te maken. Hoe meer snoep je maakt en voltooit, hoe meer recepten je ontdekt en hoe verder je winkel uitbreidt. En wat nog leuker is: neem het op tegen je vrienden in een kookwedstrijd voor vier spelers en kijk wie de heerlijkste lekkernijen kan maken! • Help mama in de keuken met allerlei heerlijke snoepjes en toetjes! • Maak 60 verschillende recepten in meer dan 160 mini-spellen met behulp van de Nintendo 3DS™-stylus en de microfoon. • Stal je zoetwaren uit in je eigen snoepwinkel en maak je klanten gelukkig. • Breid je snoepwinkel uit en activeer speciale events door zoveel mogelijk recepten te maken!

NZ.name: Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop
NZ.description: Making puddings and sweets is lots of fun in Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop! Players make and create a wide assortment of delicious looking sweets and puddings, then serve customers in the shop to keep them happy. Create 60 different recipes by taking part in over 160 different mini-games, using the Nintendo 3DS™ stylus and even the microphone to cool, slice, stir, bake and decorate their creations. And just like always, don’t worry if you make a mistake - Mama will fix it for you! Sweets can be arranged and displayed in the sweet shop, then given to your customers to bring happiness to them all. The more sweets you create and complete, the more recipes you discover and the more your shop expands. Better yet, take on your friends in a competitive cook-off for up to four players, seeing who can make the tastiest treats of all! • Join Mama in the kitchen and help her create many different delicious sweets and puddings! • Create 60 different recipes in over 160 mini-games by using the Nintendo 3DS™ stylus and even the microphone. • Arrange and display your sweet creations in your very own sweet shop to keep your customers happy. • Expand your sweet shop and trigger special events by making as many recipes as you can!

PL.description: Making puddings and sweets is lots of fun in Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop! PT.name: Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop
PT.description: Fazer doces e sobremesas é muito divertido no Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop! Os jogadores elaboram e criam uma variedade de doces e sobremesas, depois servem os clientes na loja para que continuem felizes. Crie 60 tipos diferentes de receitas participando em mais de 160 mini-jogos diferentes, usando a caneta stylus da Nintendo 3DS™ e até mesmo o microfone para esfriar, cortar, mexer, assar e decorar as suas criações. E como sempre, não se preocupe se errar - Mama consertará para você! Doces podem ser organizados e exibidos na loja de doces, depois dados aos clientes para que todos fiquem felizes. Quanto mais doces criar e completar, mais receitas você descobre para que a loja cresça ainda mais. Melhor ainda, enfrente amigos em uma competição culinária para até 4 jogadores, decidindo assim quem cria os melhores doces! • Junte-se à Mama na cozinha e ajude na criação de vários doces e sobremesas deliciosas! • Crie 60 receitas diferentes em mais de 160 mini-jogos usando a caneta stylus da Nintendo 3DS™ e até mesmo o microfone. • Organize e exiba as suas doces criações na sua própria loja de doces para manter os clientes felizes. • Amplie a sua loja de doces e ative eventos especiais criando o máximo de receitas que conseguir!

RU.name: Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop
RU.description: Так весело готовить пудинги и сладости вместе с Cooking Mama: Sweet Shop! Игроки готовят широкий ассортимент вкуснейших сладостей и пудингов и подают их посетителям их кондитерских. Приготовьте 60 различных рецептов, приняв участие в более 160 мини-игр и используя стилус Nintendo 3DS™ и даже микрофон для того, чтобы охлаждать, нарезать, мешать, печь и украшать свои творения. Можно не волноваться об ошибках — Мама их исправит! Сладости можно выставлять в кондитерской, чтобы угощать и радовать ими посетителей. Чем больше сладостей вы создаете и выставляете, тем больше рецептов вы получаете и тем больше расширяется ваша кондитерская. А еще вы можете сразиться с максимум четырьмя друзьями, чтобы узнать, кто из вас готовит лучше всех! • Помогите Маме приготовить различные вкуснейшие сладости и пудинги! • Создайте 60 разных рецептов, играя в более 160 мини-игр и используя стилус Nintendo 3DS™ и даже микрофон. • Выставляйте свои творения в кондитерской и радуйте ими посетителей. • Расширяйте свою кондитерскую и получайте особые награды, выполняя как можно больше рецептов!
